tooltips.strength: Strength: Affects melee attacks, athletics, and carrying capacity
tooltips.dexterity: Dexterity: Affects AC, initiative, and finesse weapons
tooltips.constitution: Constitution: Affects hit points and concentration checks
tooltips.intelligence: Intelligence: Affects knowledge skills and some spellcasting
tooltips.wisdom: Wisdom: Affects perception and some spellcasting
tooltips.charisma: Charisma: Affects social skills and paladin spellcasting

abilitiesList.divineSense_desc: Detect celestials, fiends, or undead within 60 feet.
abilitiesList.layOnHands_desc: Heal 25 points of damage per day.
abilitiesList.divineSmite_desc: Expend spell slot to deal extra radiant damage.
abilitiesList.oathOfDevotion_desc: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon, Turn the Unholy

campaignManager.title: Campaign Manager

locationsList.frostSpire_desc: The tallest peak in the region, home to ancient dwarven ruins and frost giants.
locationsList.evernightForest_desc: A dense, magical forest where it's always twilight, inhabited by fey creatures.
locationsList.havenVillage_desc: A small settlement at the base of Frost Spire, the last safe haven before the wilderness.

location1.description: The tallest peak in the region, home to ancient dwarven ruins and frost giants.

campaignManager.addLocationHint: Add a new location to your campaign

encounterBuilder.snowCamouflageDesc: Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.
encounterBuilder.keenSensesDesc: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
encounterBuilder.biteDesc: Melee attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.
encounterBuilder.coldBreathDesc: 15 ft. cone, recharge 5-6. DC 12 Dex save or take 18 (4d8) cold damage, half on save.

npcCreator.title: NPC Creator
npcCreator.name: Name
npcCreator.featuresExample: Small stature even for a gnome, disheveled white hair, thick silver beard, bright blue eyes that always seem curious.
npcCreator.traitsExample: Extremely curious, has a constant fascination with new knowledge, speaks quickly when excited about a topic, is absent-minded and easily forgets social conventions.
npcCreator.idealsExample: Knowledge (believes learning is the most precious good), Neutrality (considers moral judgments too simplistic), Preservation (protects ancient knowledge at all costs).
npcCreator.voiceExample: High-pitched and rapid voice, frequently uses arcane terms in everyday conversations, repeats words when excited, has the habit of adjusting non-existent glasses.
npcCreator.abilitiesExample: Exceptional arcane knowledge (specialist in ancient artifacts), rune reading, ability to cast some cantrips and 1st level spells, eidetic memory for texts and books.
npcCreator.plotHooksExample: Recently discovered forbidden texts about a lost artifact, is being pursued by cultists who want to steal his knowledge, heard rumors about an ancient elven library in the mountains.
npcCreator.relationshipExample: Potential ally who can provide information about artifacts and magical items, source of quests related to rare books and lost knowledge, could become a mentor for wizard characters.
